data.prayer: Father, move the 2,975 believers in the state of Micoud to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Micoud, Saint Lucia

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Micoud, Saint Lucia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Micoud, Saint Lucia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Micoud, Saint Lucia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Micoud
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Micoud, Micoud, Saint Lucia.
Spirit, make the church in Micoud, Saint Lucia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 16,300 citizens of Micoud, Saint Lucia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Micoud, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
